field.label: Enabled
field.help: This will enable or disable this zone.

field.label: Zone Name
field.help: Set the name for this zone. Both forward and reverse zones may be specified, i.e. example.com or 0.168.192.in-addr.arpa.

field.label: Allow Transfer with ACLs
field.help: Define the ACLs that can be used to retrieve this zone.

field.label: Allow Transfer with TSIG Keys
field.help: Define the TSIG Keys that can retrieve this zone.

field.label: Allow Query
field.help: Define an ACL where you allow which client are allowed to query this zone.

field.label: Primary IP
field.help: Set the IP address of primary server.

field.label: Transfer TSIG Key
field.help: The TSIG key used to transfer domain data from the master server.

field.label: Allow Notfiy
field.help: A list of allowed IP addresses to receive notifies from (in addition to the primary server.)
